data: `minecraft:behavior.guardian_attack` allows this entity to use a laser beam attack. Can only be used by Guardians and Elder Guardians.

data.Name: elder_extra_magic_damage
data.Description: Amount of additional damage dealt from an elder guardian's magic attack.

data.Name: hard_mode_extra_magic_damage
data.Description: In hard difficulty, amount of additional damage dealt from a guardian's magic attack.

data.Name: magic_damage
data.Description: Amount of damage dealt from a guardian's magic attack. Magic attack damage is added to the guardian's base attack damage.

data.Name: min_distance
data.Description: Guardian attack behavior stops if the target is closer than this distance (doesn't apply to elders).

data.Name: sound_delay_time
data.Description: Time (in seconds) to wait after starting an attack before playing the guardian attack sound.

data.Name: x_max_rotation
data.Description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

data.Name: y_max_head_rotation
data.Description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.
